metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「そうね。ここで働いていた頃には、欠けていたかもしれないわね」
[ベニエ]: 「きっと、貴方の周りにいる方々によって、育まれたのでしょう」
[嘉祥]: 「俺の周りの……」
時雨を見つめる。
そして、俺はネコたちのことを思い出した。
[ベニエ]: 「今の貴方になら、きっと出来るわ」
[ベニエ]: 「気をつけて帰りなさい、嘉祥」
[嘉祥]: 「はい、それはもう」
[ベニエ]: 「時雨、来てくれて本当に嬉しかったわ」
[時雨]: 「私も、すごく貴重な経験をさせていただき、とても楽しかったです」
[フレーズ]: 「お兄さん……いろいろと、ありがとうございました」
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうこそ、世話になったね、フレーズ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Correct, you might have been missing it back when you were still working here.」
[Beignet]: 「No doubt it was nurtured by those you keep around you.」
[Kashou]: 「Those I keep around me...」
I stare at Shigure.
Then, I start to think about the girls.
[Beignet]: 「As you are now, I'm sure you'll do fine.」
[Beignet]: 「Have a safe trip back home, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Yes, of course.」
[Beignet]: 「Shigure, I'm so glad you came along.」
[Shigure]: 「As am I. It was an invaluable experience that I thoroughly enjoyed.」
[Fraise]: 「Onii-san... Thank you so much for everything.」
[Kashou]: 「I should be the one thanking you for the hospitality, Fraise.」
ModelAnswer: </japanese>

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「うーん……言葉にするのは難しいけれど……皆を笑顔にするという言葉の意味かな」
[フレーズ]: 「言葉の意味……ですか？」
[フレーズ]: 「よくわからないんですが、きっと大切なものなのですね」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、そう思うよ」
[時雨]: 「フレーズ、あなたにもお世話になりました」
[フレーズ]: 「わたしこそ、とても勉強になりました。一緒に働けて、楽しかったです」
[フレーズ]: 「カメラは、ちょっと慣れそうにないのですが……」
[時雨]: 「ふふ……ささやかなお礼です、どうぞ受け取ってください」
[フレーズ]: 「なんでしょうか？」
[時雨]: 「私からの、プレゼントです」
フレーズが封筒を受け取り、中を確かめる。
入っていたのは、旅行券だった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hmm... It's hard to describe in words, but... I guess you could say I found what the words 'putting smiles on people's faces' really means.」
[Fraise]: 「What it really means...?」
[Fraise]: 「I don't quite understand, but I'm sure it's something important.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I think so, at least.」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise, I appreciate all you've done.」
[Fraise]: 「The pleasure is mine. I learned so much from you. It was so much fun being able to work with you.」
[Fraise]: 「That said, I don't think I'll be getting used to cameras any time soon...」
[Shigure]: 「Hehe... I know it's not much, but please take this.」
[Fraise]: 「What is this?」
[Shigure]: 「A present. From me to you.」
Fraise takes the envelope and checks the contents.
Inside the envelope is a travel voucher.
ModelAnswer:
```
[Kashou]: "Hmm... it's difficult to put into words, but perhaps the meaning of making everyone smile?"
[Fraise]: "The meaning of a word? "
[Fraise]: "I don't really know what you mean, but I guess it must be something very important."
[Kashou]: "Yes, I think so."
[Shigure]: "Fraise, you have also helped me too."
[Fraise]: "I learned a lot from working with you. It was fun to work together."
[Fraise]: "The camera is... not really my thing, though..."
[Shigure]: "Hm... A small token of gratitude, please accept it."
[Fraise]: "What is this?"
[Shigure]: "A gift from me to you."
Fraise opens the envelope and looks inside.
Inside was a travel voucher.
```

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「あ、あの……ベニエさん……お世話になりました」
[ベニエ]: 「時雨も、また来てくれるかしら？」
[時雨]: 「はい、必ず……」
[時雨]: 「絶対に、また来ます！」
[ベニエ]: 「楽しみに……楽しみにしているわ……」
[時雨]: 「はい！　はい！　また………………様のケーキを……食べに、来ます」
[ベニエ]: 「……ッ。ありがとう、時雨」
[時雨]: 「フレーズは素敵なネコでしたねー」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、そうだな」
[時雨]: 「日本に来てくれたら、いいのですが」
[嘉祥]: 「師匠が長々と店を休みにするとは思えないけど……まぁ、数日でも来てくれたらいいな」
[時雨]: 「きっと、うちのネコたちとも仲良くなれると思います」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「U-Um, Beignet-san... Thank you for your hospitality.」
[Beignet]: 「Will you be making another visit, too, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, absolutely.」
[Shigure]: 「I promise you, I'll be back!」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... I look forward to your return...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes! Yes! I'll be back...-sama. To eat your cake.」
[Beignet]: 「...! Thank you, Shigure.」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise sure was a wonderful catgirl.」
[Kashou]: 「She sure was.」
[Shigure]: 「I wish she would come to Japan.」
[Kashou]: 「I can't imagine my mentor closing the shop for an extended period of time, but yeah, it'd be nice if they could come for even a few days.」
[Shigure]: 「She would get along so well with our catgirls.」
ModelAnswer:
</japanese>

<english>:

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「んしょ……」
時雨は大きめのキャリーケースを引っ張っている。けっこう重そうだ。
[嘉祥]: 「今回は飛行機で２泊だから、ほぼ１泊の旅行だろう？　ずいぶんと大荷物だな？」
[時雨]: 「女性は身だしなみに小道具がいっぱい必要なのです」
[時雨]: 「あと、このドレスと和服とで、同じ靴、同じ下着というわけにはいきませんし、部屋着も必要でしたし」
[時雨]: 「フランスの宅配便の使い方は、調べていませんでしたので」
[嘉祥]: 「あー……フランスの宅配便は、あまり頼りにしないほうがいいかな」
[時雨]: 「そ、そうなんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「個人的な経験によるが……運に左右されると思うぞ」
[時雨]: 「それは困ります……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Heave...」
Shigure pulls her rather big carry-on case. Looks pretty heavy.
[Kashou]: 「This was a two-night trip by plane, which means it was roughly a one-night stay. You're packing quite the load for such a short time.」
[Shigure]: 「A girl needs many tools to keep up appearances.」
[Shigure]: 「Also, I couldn't just use the same shoes and underwear for this dress and kimono. I also needed loungewear, as well.」
[Shigure]: 「And I didn't research on how to use the French luggage delivery services.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I wouldn't put too much faith in getting your luggage delivered to the airport in France.」
[Shigure]: 「O-Oh, is that so?」
[Kashou]: 「Coming from personal experience... you're pretty much leaving it to chance.」
[Shigure]: 「Well, that sounds no good.」
ModelAnswer:
```
[Shigure]: "Um...."
Shigure is pulling a large suitcase. It looks pretty heavy.
[Kashou]: "This time we're flying for two nights, so it will be almost one night of travel, huh? You sure have a lot of luggage."
[Shigure]: "Women need a lot of small props to get ready."
[Shigure]: "And also, this dress and kimono are the same shoes and underwear, so I needed room wear as well, and...."
[Shigure]: "I didn't look into how to use French parcel delivery service."
[Kashou]: "Ahh....French parcel delivery is not very reliable, perhaps?"
[Shigure]: "So, that is...?"
[Kashou]: "Personal experience, but....It depends on luck, I think"
[Shigure]: "That would be a problem..."
```

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨、大変なら持ってあげるから、無理をする前に言ってくれよ？」
[時雨]: 「あ……」
[時雨]: 「兄様、ちょっと変わりましたね……」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、重たい荷物を運んでいる妹を気遣うくらい、今までだってしただろ？」
[嘉祥]: 「そんなに薄情な人間ではなかったと思うぞ。むしろ、お節介なくらいで……」
[時雨]: 「はい。今も昔も、兄様はとっても優しくて、素敵です」
[時雨]: 「でも、以前なら、私の言葉を待つことなく、重そうだから持ってあげるよと言うかと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そう、かな……？」
[時雨]: 「それはそれで、とても嬉しいことですし、私は感謝したと思いますが」
[時雨]: 「でも、今の兄様は、私に判断を任せてくれました」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, I can take that for you if it's too much, so just ask before you break your back.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh...」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, I think you've changed a bit...」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Looking out for my little sister carrying a bunch of heavy luggage isn't something new for me, is it?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」
[Shigure]: 「That being the case, it's an extremely kind gesture, and I would appreciate it.」
[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Time, if you need it, I'll carry it for you. Just tell me before you overdo it."
[Time]: "Ahh..."
[Time]: "Brother, you seem to have changed a bit..."
[Kashou]: "What? You mean you didn't care about your sister carrying heavy luggage before?"
[Kashou]: "I don't think I was so heartless. In fact, I was too kind, even overbearing..."
[Time]: "Yes. Brother has always been very kind and wonderful."
[Time]: "But in the past, if I were to say that it seemed heavy, you would have offered to carry it for me."
[Kashou]: "So...?"
[Time]: "That is also a very nice thing, but..."
[Time]: "Now, Brother has given me the decision to make."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「きっと自覚はないのでしょう。ちょっとした変化です。兄様マニアの私でなければ、見逃してしまいますわ」
[嘉祥]: 「お、おう……」
俺自身のことなのに、妹のほうが把握しているというのも、どうかと思うが……
[時雨]: 「ここ数日のことだけでなく……きっと、これまでの日々の積み重ねが、兄様を変えたのでしょうね」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は何も変わったつもりはないけれど、時雨が言うのなら、変わったのかもしれない」
ネコたちと過ごした日々があって、師匠の言葉があって、今の俺が形作られているのだろう。
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、師匠があれだけの話をしてくれたんだ。俺だって少しは学ぶさ」
[時雨]: 「学びはありましたか？」
[嘉祥]: 「たぶんな。俺も、自分が洋菓子を作る理由を考えてみたよ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You probably don't realize it yourself since it's such a minor change. If I weren't such a Nii-sama fanatic, I would have overlooked it myself.」
[Kashou]: 「U-Uh, sure...」
Not sure how I feel about my sister being able to pick up on something about me better than... well, me.
[Shigure]: 「I'm sure that the past few days alone haven't changed you... but rather, the culmination of the days leading up until now have.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't really think I've changed any, but maybe I did if you say so.」
The days I spent with the girls, my mentor's words— all those things have probably helped shape the person I am now.
[Kashou]: 「Well, Mentor was willing to share that much of her story with me. I could learn a thing or two myself.」
[Shigure]: 「Were you able to learn anything?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I think. I tried thinking of my own reasons for pastry-making.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "You probably don't even realize it. It is just a slight change. I, the sister of the master, would have missed it."
[Kashou]: "O, uh...."
It is my own thing, but my sister has a better grasp on it than me........
[Shigure]: "Not only these few days, but probably, all those days that led up to this changed you, master."
[Kashou]: "I haven't changed anything myself, but if Shigure says so, I might have."
The time spent with the cats and the words of my master made me what I am today.
[Kashou]: "Well, my master did tell me a lot of things. I will learn something too."
[Shigure]: "Did you learn anything?"
[Kashou]: "Probably. I also thought about why I make Western sweets."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「それが言葉だけだったんじゃないか、と思ってな」
[時雨]: 「そんな！　言葉だけなんてこと……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、本当の心の奥底にある理由を……俺は自分自身の気持ちを、深く考えてみたんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「結局のところ、俺は……親父に認められたいんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「いい歳して、反抗期なんじゃないか？」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、承認欲求に満ちたエゴイストなんだろう、きっと」
[嘉祥]: 「すまないな、時雨……幻滅させたかな……？」
[時雨]: 「それが、兄様が洋菓子を作っている理由なんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「そうじゃなければ、親父に否定されたくらいで、こんなにも悩んだりはしないだろう」
[時雨]: 「もしかしたら、そういう気持ちはあるのかもしれません」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm starting to think those were just words.」
[Shigure]: 「No way! No way they're just words...」
[Kashou]: 「No, I mean the real reason deep in my heart... I tried giving my own feelings some deep thought.」
[Kashou]: 「Ultimately, I... just want dad to approve of me.」
[Kashou]: 「A little too old to be going through my rebellious teenager phase, I know.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm pretty sure I'm being egotistical and trying to seek approval.」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, Shigure. Did I shatter your illusion of me...?」
[Shigure]: 「Is that your reason for making pastries, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「If it wasn't, I wouldn't be this broken up about dad disapproving of me.」
[Shigure]: 「That could very well play a part in it, yes.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "I thought it was just a matter of words."
[Shigure]: "Such! Words only......?"
[Kashou]: "No, I tried to think about my own feelings deeply. In the end, I realized that..."
[Kashou]: "I want my father to accept me."
[Kashou]: "Isn't this just a rebellious phase? At my age?"
[Kashou]: "I must be an egotistical person with a lot of approval seeking. Probably."
[Kashou]: "Sorry, Shigure......disappointed you?"
[Shigure]: "That's the reason why you make Western sweets, isn't it?"
[Kashou]: "No, if that wasn't the case, I wouldn't have been so troubled by my father rejecting me."
[Shigure]: "Perhaps there is such a feeling inside of you..."

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは……そうだけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、あれこれ命令されて、釈然としない気持ちがあったのは間違いない」
[嘉祥]: 「素直に従う気になれなくて、フランスに留学したんだ」
[時雨]: 「父様に認められたいだけなら、ネコたちを喜ばせるためにケーキを作る必要はなかったと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、それは……」
[時雨]: 「お客さんに認めてもらうために頑張るのは、お店をやっている以上は、当然のことだと思いますが」
[嘉祥]: 「う、む……」
[時雨]: 「兄様は、対抗心だけでお菓子を作っているわけじゃないです。そのことは、私がよく知っています」
[時雨]: 「ネコたちに喜んでもらえたときの、兄様の笑顔……どこに、父様への反抗心があるというのですか？」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「W-Well... That's true, but...」
[Kashou]: 「But I definitely felt frustrated after having him boss me around.」
[Kashou]: 「I couldn't find it in me to comply, so I went to study abroad in France.」
[Shigure]: 「If you just wanted father's approval, then I wouldn't think you'd need to bake cakes to please the girls.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that was just...」
[Shigure]: 「I do think that trying your best for your customer's approval is natural so long as you operate a business.」
[Kashou]: 「Um, yeah...」
[Shigure]: 「But you're not making pastries just to be a rebel. That much I know well.」
[Shigure]: 「The smile on your face when you make the girls happy... What part of that has to do with rebelling against Father?」
ModelAnswer:
</japanese>

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうな、時雨。おかげで、もう少しだけ前に進めそうだよ」
[時雨]: 「兄様……もったいないお言葉です」
[ショコラ]: 「今日は、お仕事、頑張りました！」
[バニラ]: 「頑張ったショコラ、えらい」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまのお留守を守るため、頑張ったんです！」
[バニラ]: 「留守を守ったショコラ、えらい」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さま、喜んでくれるかなー？」
[バニラ]: 「もちろん」

[バニラ]: 「ケーキの味のこと、私たちには難しい」
[ショコラ]: 「う、うん。わかってるにゃ……」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Thanks, Shigure. I feel like I can move forward a little bit more now.」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama... I am humbled.」
[Chocola]: 「Chocola worked hard today!!」
[Vanilla]: 「You're great for working so hard, Chocola.」
[Chocola]: 「She did her best to hold down the fort for Master!」
[Vanilla]: 「Good job on holding down the fort.」
[Chocola]: 「Do you think Master would be pleased?」
[Vanilla]: 「Of course.」
[Chocola]: 「...But the thing Master is worried about right nyow isn't the shop...」
[Vanilla]: 「It's about the flavor of his cakes. A matter too hard for us.」
[Chocola]: 「Y-Yeah, Chocola knyows that...」

</japanese>

metadata:
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[バニラ]: 「わからない」
[バニラ]: 「でも、お店を頑張るのは、ご主人のためになってる」
[ショコラ]: 「そうにゃんだけど……」
[ショコラ]: 「ううぅー……ご主人さまぁ！」
[バニラ]: 「んしょ……」
[ショコラ]: 「勝手にベッドを使ったら、怒られるかな？」
[バニラ]: 「これはきっと……ご褒美」
[ショコラ]: 「あ……そうだね！　ショコラ、今日はお仕事、がんばりました！」
[バニラ]: 「私も、がんばった」
[バニラ]: 「くんくん……　ご主人の匂いがする……」
[ショコラ]: 「う、うん……くんくん……」
[ショコラ]: 「はふぅ～……ご主人さまご主人さまご主人さまご主人さま～」
[バニラ]: 「こうしていると、ご主人と一緒に寝ているみたい」
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「I don't know.」
[Vanilla]: 「But doing our best with the shop will help Master in the long run.」
[Chocola]: 「You're nyot wrong, but...」
[Chocola]: 「Unghhh... Master!」
[Vanilla]: 「A-hup...」
[Chocola]: 「Won't Master get mad at us if we use his bed without permission?」
[Vanilla]: 「This is... our reward.」
[Chocola]: 「Oh... That's right! Chocola worked hard at work today!」
[Vanilla]: 「I also worked hard.」
[Vanilla]: 「Sniff, sniff... I can smell Master's scent...」
[Chocola]: 「Y-Yeah... Sniff, sniff...」
[Chocola]: 「Hah-fhh~... Master, Master, Master, Master~」
[Vanilla]: 「When I'm here like this, it's like I'm sleeping next to Master.」
ModelAnswer:
</japanese>

<english>:

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……けっこう遅くなったな」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。夕食には戻れるかと思っていたのですが」
飛行機の到着がやや遅れ、俺たちは夜になって帰宅した。
まだネコたちが店にいるだろうから、と時雨も水無月家ではなく、俺と一緒にラ・ソレイユへ。
[嘉祥]: 「さすがにこの行脚はキツかったな」
しかも、向こうでは立ち仕事が多かった。
[時雨]: 「私は、ぜんぜん大丈夫です。　お気遣いは無用です、兄様」
気丈に笑みを浮かべるが、疲労の色は隠せない。
[嘉祥]: 「ウチで休んでいくといい。　なんなら泊まって、明日帰ってもいいし」
[時雨]: 「お泊まりですか！？」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Phew... It sure got late.」
[Shigure]: 「That it did. I thought that we could make it back in time for dinner.」
My plane landed somewhat late, so I end up home around nighttime.
Figuring that the catgirls would be at the shop, Shigure comes with me to La Soleil instead of the Minaduki house.
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I guess the trek over was asking a lot.」
Plus, we did so much work on our feet overseas.
[Shigure]: 「I'm perfectly fine. You needn't worry about me, Nii-sama.」
Shigure gives a firm smile, but she can't hide her exhaustion.
[Kashou]: 「You can rest up at my house. You can also stay over and go back home tomorrow, if you want.」
[Shigure]: 「Stay over?!」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Huh... it got pretty late, huh?"
[Shigure]: "Yes. I was expecting to be back for dinner by now."
The flight was a bit delayed and we returned home in the evening.
Since the cats are still at the shop, Shigure also went with me to La Soleil instead of going back to the Minaduki household.
[Kashou]: "Well... this pilgrimage has been pretty taxing."
And on top of that, we had a lot of standing work over there.
[Shigure]: "I'm fine.  I don't need you to worry about me, brother."
She smiles bravely but the fatigue is evident in her face.
[Kashou]: "You can stay at our place for a while.  You can even stay over and come back tomorrow if you want."
[Shigure]: "Staying overnight!?"

[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female

[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
かといって、送っていくほどの余裕もなく。俺も明日は早くから大忙しだろうし。
[時雨]: 「なんということでしょう……また兄様と……同じベッドだなんて！」
[嘉祥]: 「そんなわけあるか。　俺はリビングのソファーを使うから大丈夫だ」
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラとバニラにベッドを取られたときも、そこで寝てたしな」
ちょっと懐かしい。
[時雨]: 「それは、春先の話ですよね？　今は真冬ですよ、兄様」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……まぁ、コートを毛布代わりにするよ」
[時雨]: 「兄様に風邪をひかれては困ります」
そんなことを話しつつ、俺たちはラ・ソレイユへと戻るのだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ただいま」
reference_answer:
That being said, I don't have the leisure to drop her off at home either. I'm going to be super busy starting bright and early tomorrow.
[Shigure]: 「What a turn of events... To think that I would be in the same bed as Nii-sama once more!」
[Kashou]: 「As if. I'd be using the sofa in the living room, so don't worry.」
[Kashou]: 「I used to sleep there whenever Chocola and Vanilla took over my bed, after all.」
Kind of takes me down memory lane.
[Shigure]: 「But that was at the start of spring, right? It's the middle of winter now, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Urk... Well, I'll just use my coat as a blanket.」
[Shigure]: 「I would rather you not catch a cold, Nii-sama.」
As we share a back-and-forth, the two of us head in to La Soleil.
[Kashou]: 「Hey, we're back.」
ModelAnswer:
</japanese>

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……相手の立場に立って、相手の気持ちを考える。　当たり前のようで、なかなかに難しい」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は皆を笑顔にすると言いながら、結局は師匠の味を追いかけるばかりだった……」
[嘉祥]: 「それは皆を笑顔にする味を追いかけてるだけだ」
師匠の味を再現できれば、皆を笑顔にできると思っていた。
[メイプル]: 「ん？　それらは違うことなの？」
[嘉祥]: 「それだけじゃ、足りないってことさ。　問題は、味として、どう表現するか……だけど」

[バニラ]: 「ご主人、また悩んでる？」
[嘉祥]: 「はは、大丈夫。　考えてはいるけれど、もう悩んでないよ」
[嘉祥]: 「……俺は……みんなに伝えたいことがあるんだ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「...Considering someone else's feelings from their perspective. It sounds natural, but it's actually pretty hard.」
[Kashou]: 「I say that I want to 'put smiles on everyone's faces', but in the end, I was only chasing after my mentor's flavor...」
[Kashou]: 「I was only chasing after 'a flavor to put smiles on everyone's faces'.」
I thought that if I could replicate my mentor's flavor, then I could put smiles on faces.
[Maple]: 「Hm? You mean those are different things?」
[Kashou]: 「It means that alone isn't good enough. The issue is how you represent that flavor... but...」
[Chocola]: 「Master, are you okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Do you still feel lost?」
[Kashou]: 「Hahah, I'm fine. I'm thinking, but I'm not lost anymore.」
[Kashou]: 「...There's something that I want to tell you all.」

[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Coconut (ココナツ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)

Question:
タコヤキ屋もクリスマスの夜は特別か。
[嘉祥]: 「そうだ。ちょっと待っててくれ」
[ミルク]: 「にゃうん？」
俺は厨房に行き、すぐ戻った。

[ココナツ]: 「ミルクちゃん、クルマに気をつけてね？」
reference_answer:
I guess Christmas night is special for takoyaki stalls, too.
[Kashou]: 「I see. Hey, could you hang tight for a second?」
[Milk]: 「Nya-hmm?」
I take a short trip to the kitchen.
[Kashou]: 「For getting along so well with everybody else. Consider it my Christmas present to you.」
I place edible Santa-shaped decorations on the shortcakes.
[Milk]: 「Wowie! So cute... I love it!!」
[Milk]: 「Thank you, mister!!」
Um, mister makes me feel really old, but whatever.
[Kashou]: 「Hahah... Merry Christmas. Say hi to your master for me, too.」
[Milk]: 「Okay!」
[Cinnamon]: 「Be careful on your way home, okay~?」
[Coconut]: 「Milk-chan, watch out for cars, okay?」

</japanese>

[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[淡雪]: 「ええ、フランスのラ・ソレイユっていうお店の」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、師匠の焼き菓子をお土産にしてたのか！？」
[アズキ]: 「時雨ー！？」
[時雨]: 「じ、実はキャリーケースに１箱しか入らなかったんです！」
[時雨]: 「ネコたちのぶんは、兄様が作ってくださいますよ。　そうですよね？」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……ああ……同じように作れるかなぁ……？」
[ショコラ]: 「お師匠さまのフィナンシェは、ご主人さまのと味が違うんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだな。そもそも、使っている材料も違うし」
全ての材料をフランスから取り寄せていたら、超高級店みたいな価格設定になってしまう。
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「Yes, from a shop called 'La Soleil' in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? You gave her my mentor's baked goods as a souvenir?!」
[Azuki]: 「Shigure?!」
[Shigure]: 「Th-The truth is... I could only fit one box in my carry-on case!」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama will make all the catgirls's portions. Isn't that right?」
[Kashou]: 「S-Sure... Can I even make it the same, though...?」
[Chocola]: 「Is your mentor's financier different in taste than yours, Master?」
[Kashou]: 「It is. Right down to the ingredients we use.」
If I were to get all my ingredients from France, we'd have to have some super high-class patisserie prices to recoup.
ModelAnswer:
You are an expert visual novel translator. Translate the following Japanese script into natural English. Follow these strict rules:
1.  **Dialogue Format:** If a speaker is present, the output MUST be `SPEAKER_NAME: "DIALOGUE"`. For narration with no speaker, output only the translated text.
2.  **No Commentary:** Do NOT add any extra text, explanations, or dialogue tags like 'said' or 'asked'.
3.  **Preserve Elements:** Keep all Japanese honorifics (e.g., -san, -sama) and transliterate onomatopoeia (e.g., 'doki doki').

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Oh, a Christmas present! Thank you so much, mother!"
[Awayuki]: "Maybe it's too early, but what if Kashou gets angry and goes back home?"
[Shigure]: "Ugh..."
[Kashou]: "N-No, that won't be today! Trust me"
[Awayuki]: "Yes, for Kashou as well"
[Kashou]: "Ah, uh... thank you"
[Awayuki]: "Open it up?"
As she said, he took off the wrapping paper and opened the small box.
[Kashou]: "......a photo frame?"
It doesn't seem to have any photos in it.
[Awayuki]: "Put one of your memories from this year on display in your room? It might be fun"
Oh, I remember that time when Shigure gave her for her birthday.

metadata:
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまの！　あ、でも、どの写真が……うーん……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、ソレイユ開店記念のときの写真にする。　ご主人さまとバニラと３人で撮ったやつ！」
[バニラ]: 「いいね。グッドチョイス。私も、そうする」
[メイプル]: 「あたしは、どうしようかしら？」
[シナモン]: 「アレがいいんじゃない～？　船で一緒に歌ったときの」
[シナモン]: 「動画だけじゃなく、写真も撮ってもらってたよね～？」
[メイプル]: 「あー。」
[メイプル]: 「……そうね。　ちょっと恥ずかしい気もするけれど」
[メイプル]: 「あれが、この１年で私にとって、一番大切な想い出だわ」
[シナモン]: 「メーちゃんの一番大切な思い出に……わたしも写って……はぁはぁ……うっ」
[メイプル]: 「え？　自分だけ写ってる写真なんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「One of Master! Oh, but, which one? Hmm...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, I'll put in the photo to commemorate the opening of La Soleil. The one with you, Master, and Chocola!」
[Vanilla]: 「Nice. Good choice. I'll do the same.」
[Maple]: 「What should I go with?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Why not that one~? You know, the one of us singing on the boat together.」
[Cinnamon]: 「They didn't just take videos; there's photos from then, too, right~?」
[Maple]: 「Aah, yeah.」
[Maple]: 「...Right. I feel like that'd be kind of embarrassing.」
[Maple]: 「But that is the most precious memory of the year to me.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm going to be in... May-chan's most precious memory... Hah, hah... Uhhh...」
[Maple]: 「Huh? I'm picking one with just me in it, though...」
ModelAnswer:
</japanese>
